Why do you upload something that does not even work?

For people getting ia 32 bit .dll error you have to download java 7 32 bit and edit the bat file to point to the 32 bit version of java.This game only works with the 32 bit version of java and the file path is 

C:Program Files (x86)Javajre7binjava.exe

or whatever letter your drive is that java is on.
